info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 500 PM MST... At 414 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Globe, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Globe, Miami, Cutter, Central Heights-Midland City, Claypool and Inspiration. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 243 and 270. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 261. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 167 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
